filled with spikes at her...

> Nighlight::
>
> She shot again 10 feather-missiles and 15 fireballs against  Clash.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Clash was hit in the head. He hadn't expected that.
> >
> > Clash: What? That cannot have happened, I am perfect. But you shall
> not hit
> > me again.
> >
> > Clash took to the air and swung a wild forearm at Nightlight,
> blades popping
> > out from his arms.
> >
> > (My long battle shall continue with another long piece) Perplex,
> meanwhile,
> > was having the best of luck. Serge struck again and again, but
> couldn't hit
> > Perplex. Serge started to cry and whine. Perplex stopped to look at
> Serge.
> > Serge tried to take the opportunity to hit Perplex, but Perplex
> moved up and
> > sliced right through Serge's arm. Perplex landed from his jump.
> Serge's arm
> > clattering to the ground. Serge started backing away, but Perplex
> moved
> > towards him. Serge started whining again, this was for real.
> Perplex frowned
> > in disaproval, he didn't want to kill such a helpless beast, but it
> looked
> > like...A streak of anger ran through Perplex. He turned around and
> looked
> > back to the ship. Zeni ran back inside. Perplex realized that he
> must have
> > been over there the whole time. This anger distracted him and Serge
> took
> > advantage, grabbing Perplex in his other hand. Perplex was not a
> bot of
> > size, not even decent size. And Serge was large. Not overly large,
> like
> > Optimal Optimus, but he was as big as you could go without moding.
> Serge
> > laughed diabolically. Perplex pressed to his sides, and forced
> Serge's hand
> > open, hanging on and dropping, like as if he was extremely heavy.
> He tore
> > off Serge's hand. Serge looked at his missing hand and arm, and
> started to
> > retreat backwards again. Perplex briefly considered letting him get
> away,
> > slowly walking after him...
